Q: AAC Jet在2024年每个月飞往United States的航班数量是怎样的？请按环比变化排序。
SQL:
WITH biao_1 AS (
        SELECT
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id,
                a.arr_country_id,
                COUNT(*) AS num
        FROM
                zts_plane_flight_1 a
                JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
        WHERE
                b.supplier_id = "1007"
                AND a.arr_country_id = "165"
                AND a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01'
                AND '2024-12'
        GROUP BY
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id,
                a.arr_country_id
        ),
        biao_2 AS ( SELECT *, LAG( num ) OVER ( PARTITION BY supplier_id, arr_country_id ORDER BY date_month ) AS last_num FROM biao_1 ),
        biao_3 AS (
        SELECT
                date_month,
                supplier_id,
                arr_country_id,
                num,
                last_num,
                ROUND((( num - last_num ) / last_num ) * 100, 2 ) AS rate_value
        FROM
                biao_2
        WHERE
                last_num > 0
        ) SELECT
        date_month,
        supplier_id,
        arr_country_id,
        num,
        last_num,
        CONCAT( rate_value, '%' ) AS rate
FROM
        biao_3
ORDER BY
        rate_value DESC;
actual_SQL:
WITH biao_1 AS (
        SELECT
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id,
                a.arr_city_id,
                COUNT(*) AS num
        FROM
                zts_plane_flight_1 a
                JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
        WHERE
                b.supplier_id = "1007"
                AND a.arr_country_id = "165"
                AND a.arr_city_id = "1803690905632817153"
                AND a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01'
                AND '2024-12'
        GROUP BY
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id,
                a.arr_city_id
        ),
        biao_2 AS ( SELECT *, LAG( num ) OVER ( PARTITION BY supplier_id, arr_city_id ORDER BY date_month ) AS last_num FROM biao_1 ),
        biao_3 AS (
        SELECT
                date_month,
                supplier_id,
                arr_city_id,
                num,
                last_num,
                ROUND((( num - last_num ) / last_num ) * 100, 2 ) AS rate_value
        FROM
                biao_2
        WHERE
                last_num > 0
        ) SELECT
        date_month,
        supplier_id,
        arr_city_id,
        num,
        last_num,
        CONCAT( rate_value, '%' ) AS rate
FROM
        biao_3
ORDER BY
        rate_value DESC;

actual_SQL:
WITH biao_1 AS (
        SELECT
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id,
                a.arr_city_id,
                COUNT(*) AS num
        FROM
                zts_plane_flight_1 a
                JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
        WHERE
                b.supplier_id = "1008"
                AND a.arr_country_id = "165"
                AND a.arr_city_id = "1803690905632817153"
                AND a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01'
                AND '2024-12'
        GROUP BY
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id,
                a.arr_city_id
        ),
        biao_2 AS ( 
                SELECT *, 
                LAG(num) OVER (PARTITION BY supplier_id, arr_city_id ORDER BY date_month) AS last_num 
                FROM biao_1 
        ),
        biao_3 AS (
        SELECT
                date_month,
                supplier_id,
                arr_city_id,
                num,
                last_num,
                ROUND(((num - last_num) / last_num) * 100, 2) AS rate_value
        FROM
                biao_2
        WHERE
                last_num > 0
        ) 
SELECT
        date_month,
        supplier_id,
        arr_city_id,
        num,
        last_num,
        CONCAT(rate_value, '%') AS rate
FROM
        biao_3
ORDER BY
        rate_value DESC;

Q: 45 North Aviation在2024年每个月飞往United States的航班数量是怎样的？请按环比变化排序。
SQL:
WITH biao_1 AS (
        SELECT
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id,
                a.arr_country_id,
                COUNT(*) AS num
        FROM
                zts_plane_flight_1 a
                JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
        WHERE
                b.supplier_id = "1004"
                AND a.arr_country_id = "165"
                AND a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01'
                AND '2024-12'
        GROUP BY
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id,
                a.arr_country_id
        ),
        biao_2 AS ( SELECT *, LAG( num ) OVER ( PARTITION BY supplier_id, arr_country_id ORDER BY date_month ) AS last_num FROM biao_1 ),
        biao_3 AS (
        SELECT
                date_month,
                supplier_id,
                arr_country_id,
                num,
                last_num,
                ROUND((( num - last_num ) / last_num ) * 100, 2 ) AS rate_value
        FROM
                biao_2
        WHERE
                last_num > 0
        ) SELECT
        date_month,
        supplier_id,
        arr_country_id,
        num,
        last_num,
        CONCAT( rate_value, '%' ) AS rate
FROM
        biao_3
ORDER BY
        rate_value DESC;
actual_SQL:
WITH flights_per_month AS (
        SELECT
                a.date_month,
                COUNT(*) AS num
        FROM
                zts_plane_flight_1 a
                JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
        WHERE
                b.supplier_id = '1004'
                AND a.arr_country_id = '165'
                AND a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01' AND '2024-12'
        GROUP BY
                a.date_month
),
flights_with_change AS (
        SELECT
                date_month,
                num,
                LAG(num) OVER (ORDER BY date_month) AS last_num
        FROM
                flights_per_month
)
SELECT
        date_month,
        num,
        last_num,
        num - last_num AS diff_num,
        CONCAT(ROUND((num - last_num) / last_num * 100, 2), '%') AS rate
FROM
        flights_with_change
WHERE
        last_num IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY
        rate DESC;

                a.date_month,

        ),
        biao_2 AS ( SELECT *, LAG( num ) OVER ( PARTITION BY supplier_id, arr_country_id ORDER BY date_month ) AS last_num FROM biao_1 ),
        biao_3 AS (
        SELECT

WITH biao_1 AS (
        SELECT
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id,
                a.arr_country_id,
                COUNT(*) AS num
        FROM
                zts_plane_flight_1 a
                JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
        WHERE
                b.supplier_id = "1015"
                AND a.arr_country_id = "165"
                AND a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01'
                AND '2024-12'
        GROUP BY
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id,
                a.arr_country_id
        ),
        biao_2 AS (
                SELECT 
                        *, 
                        LAG( num ) OVER ( PARTITION BY supplier_id, arr_country_id ORDER BY date_month ) AS last_num 
                FROM 
                        biao_1 
        ),
        biao_3 AS (
        SELECT
                date_month,
                supplier_id,
                arr_country_id,
                num,
                last_num,
                ROUND((( num - last_num ) / last_num ) * 100, 2 ) AS rate_value
        FROM
                biao_2
        WHERE
                last_num > 0
        ) 
SELECT
        date_month,
        supplier_id,
        arr_country_id,
        num,
        last_num,
        CONCAT( rate_value, '%' ) AS rate
FROM
        biao_3
ORDER BY

                a.arr_country_id
        ),
        biao_2 AS ( SELECT *, LAG( num ) OVER ( PARTITION BY supplier_id, arr_country_id ORDER BY date_month ) AS last_num FROM biao_1 ),
        biao_3 AS (
        SELECT
                date_month,
                supplier_id,
                arr_country_id,
                num,
                last_num,
                ROUND((( num - last_num ) / last_num ) * 100, 2 ) AS rate_value
        FROM
                biao_2
        WHERE
                last_num > 0
        ) SELECT
        date_month,
        supplier_id,
        arr_country_id,
        num,
        last_num,
        CONCAT( rate_value, '%' ) AS rate
FROM
        biao_3
ORDER BY
        rate_value DESC;
actual_SQL:
WITH biao_1 AS (
        SELECT
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id,
                a.arr_country_id,
                COUNT(*) AS num
        FROM
                zts_plane_flight_1 a
                JOIN aircraft_details b ON a.pure_reg = b.pure_reg
        WHERE
                b.supplier_id = "1019"
                AND a.arr_country_id = "165"
                AND a.date_month BETWEEN '2024-01'
                AND '2024-12'
        GROUP BY
                a.date_month,
                b.supplier_id,
                a.arr_country_id
        ),
        biao_2 AS (
            SELECT 
                *, 
                LAG(num) OVER (PARTITION BY supplier_id, arr_country_id ORDER BY date_month) AS last_num 
            FROM 
                biao_1 
        ),
        biao_3 AS (
            SELECT
                date_month,
                supplier_id,
                arr_country_id,
                num,
                last_num,
                ROUND(((num - last_num) / last_num) * 100, 2) AS rate_value
            FROM
                biao_2
            WHERE
                last_num > 0
        ) 
SELECT
        date_month,
        supplier_id,
        arr_country_id,
        num,
        last_num,
        CONCAT(rate_value, '%') AS rate
FROM
        biao_3
ORDER BY
        rate_value DESC;
